games.title: The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild
games.description: An action-adventure game set in an open world where players control Link as he embarks on a quest to defeat the Calamity Ganon.

games.title: Red Dead Redemption 2
games.description: A western-themed action-adventure game that follows Arthur Morgan, a member of the Van der Linde gang, as he navigates the dying Wild West.

games.title: Cyberpunk 2077
games.description: A futuristic open-world RPG where players assume the role of V, a mercenary in the dystopian Night City, in pursuit of immortality.

games.title: Super Mario Odyssey
games.description: A platformer where players control Mario as he travels across various worlds to rescue Princess Peach from Bowser.

games.title: GTA 6
games.description: Set within the fictional open world state of Leonida—based on Florida—and its Miami-inspired Vice City, the story is expected to follow criminal duo Lucia and her male partner
